content.description:
The question refers to the images shown.

© Yann Arthus-Bertrand / Corbis © De Agostini Picture Library / G. Dagli Orti / The Bridgeman Art Library

The images show an exterior and an interior view of Hagia Sophia.
content.question: Byzantine churches built after Hagia Sophia often imitated its

choices.label: use of concrete poured into molds
use of a dome resting on pendentives

content.answer: use of a dome resting on pendentives

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain the influence of a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) on other artistic production within or across cultures.
